author: ate
msg: WICKET-650: New Wicket Portlet support: use a RequestContext for abstracted url generation,  writing header response and namespacing
- New generic RequestContext class which name better reflects its purpose.
This provides boolean isPortletRequest() which will allow conditionally different behavior when running in a Portlet Context
or otherwise behave as expected in a plain Servlet Context, e.g. all the RequestContext methods do nothing or return null/default values.

author: ruwan
msg: Adding new handler module. This will enable Synapse to be engaged in to an axis2 service and do mediation either on the client side or else server side itself. This needs the API change of SynEnv.injectMessage which goes with this commit.

author: peterreilly
msg: Bugzilla 43292: filtermapper could throw an NPE. - change FileUtils to return an empty string rather than null for zero-length files

author: bago
msg: Update dnsjnio to the new ASLv2 licensed/java 1.4 compatible 0.9.8 release (JSPF-41)
